SEARCH
Package edu.iuh.fit.ex3

Class CourseList

java.lang.Object
edu.iuh.fit.ex3.CourseList
public class CourseList extends Object
This class manages a list of Course objects, providing functionalities such as adding, removing, searching, and sorting courses. It also allows finding the department with the most courses and the courses with the maximum credits.
Since:
27/08/2024

    • CourseList

      public CourseList(int n)
      Constructs a new CourseList with the specified initial capacity.
      Parameters:
      n - the initial capacity of the course list
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the initial capacity is less than or equal to 0

  • Method Details

    • getCourses

      public Course[] getCourses()
      Returns the array of Course objects managed by this CourseList.
      Returns:
      the array of courses

    • addCourse

      public boolean addCourse(Course course)
      Adds a new Course to the list.
      Parameters:
      course - the course to be added
      Returns:
      true if the course was successfully added; false if the course already exists, is null, or the list is full

    • removeCourse

      public boolean removeCourse(String courseID)
      Removes a Course from the list by its ID.
      Parameters:
      courseID - the ID of the course to be removed
      Returns:
      true if the course was successfully removed; false if the course ID was not found or is null

    • searchCourseById

      public Course searchCourseById(String courseID)
      Searches for a code Course by its ID.
      Parameters:
      courseID - the ID of the course to be searched
      Returns:
      the Course with the specified ID, or null if not found

    • searchCourse

      public Course[] searchCourse(String courseName)
      Searches for courses by their title.
      Parameters:
      courseName - the title of the courses to be searched
      Returns:
      an array of Course objects with the specified title, or null if none found

    • searchCourseByDepartment

      public Course[] searchCourseByDepartment(String department)
      Searches for courses by their department.
      Parameters:
      department - the department of the courses to be searched
      Returns:
      an array of Course objects in the specified department, or null if none found

    • findMaxCreditCourses

      public Course[] findMaxCreditCourses()
      Finds the courses with the maximum credits.
      Returns:
      an array of Course objects with the highest credits, or null if no courses are available

    • findDepartmentWithMostCourses

      public String findDepartmentWithMostCourses()
      Finds the department with the most courses.
      Returns:
      the department name with the most courses, or null if no courses are available

    • sortCourse

      public Course[] sortCourse()
      Sorts the courses by their title in alphabetical order.
      Returns:
      an array of Course objects sorted by title
